product_name: Salomon XA Midlayer Half-Zip Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Salomon XA Midlayer half-zip top lets you adjust ventilation and control body temperature on the go-ideal for highly aerobic sports such as trail running and Nordic skiing. Soft, stretch-woven fleece interior wicks moisture and dries quickly; stretchy polyester exterior offers a smooth texture. Partial zipper quickly releases body heat; underarm stretch panels promote ventilation and allow a full range of motion. Reflective elements keep you visible in low light. Salomon XA Midlayer half-zip top features an active fit that skims the body without being too tight. Closeout.
short_description: The Salomon XA Midlayer half-zip top lets you adjust ventilation and control body temperature on the go-ideal for highly aerobic sports such as trail running and Nordic skiing.
